Embrace the timeless charm of Buffalo Check with our Super Snuggle Flannel Fabric. Each strand of this 100% cotton fabric is brushed on both sides, ensuring a warmth and softness that'll make you want to wrap yourself in it. Its versatility is unmatched - whether you're crafting loungewear, cozy blankets, chic dog bandanas, or sustainable cloth towels, this fabric offers quality and style. Plus, it's easy to care for, ensuring lasting vibrancy and comfort.

data.name: Leaves Beige Super Snuggle Flannel Fabric
data.description:
Get with Leaves Beige Super Snuggle Flannel Fabric

Experience the ultimate comfort with our Leaves Beige Super Snuggle Flannel Fabric. Made with 100% cotton, this fabric is perfect for creating warm and blankets and more. The beige color and leaf pattern add a touch of nature to your projects, making them perfect for fall and winter.

Our flannel fabric is easy to care for, simply machine wash in normal cold water, use nonchlorine bleach if needed, tumble dry on low, and cool iron if necessary. Imported for your convenience, this fabric is 43 inches wide and perfect for a variety of sewing projects.

Product Details

  • Width: 43 inches
  • Content: 100% Cotton
  • Care: Machine wash normal cold, nonchlorine bleach, tumble dry low, cool iron
  • Imported

Experience the ultimate comfort with our Chickens & Pigs on Green Super Snuggle Flannel Fabric. Made from 100% cotton, this fabric is perfect for creating cozy blankets, loungewear, bibs, burp cloths, and tote bags. With a width of 42 inches, you'll have plenty of fabric to work with for all your crafting needs.

Product Details

  • Width: 42 inches
  • Content: 100% Cotton
  • Care: Machine wash gentle cold, tumble dry low, cool iron. Do not use chlorine bleach or fabric softener.
  • Best used for: Blankets, Loungewear, Bibs, Burp Cloths, Tote Bags

data.description:
Get Cozy with White Daisies on Pink Super Snuggle Flannel Fabric

Transform your next sewing project with the soft and charming White Daisies on Pink Super Snuggle Flannel Fabric. This 100% cotton fabric is perfect for creating cozy blankets, loungewear, bibs, burp cloths, tote bags, and more. The delicate white daisies on a soft pink background will add a touch of sweetness to any creation.

For easy care, simply machine wash gentle cold, tumble dry low, and cool iron. Avoid using chlorine bleach or fabric softener to keep your fabric looking its best.

Product Details

  • Width: 42 inches
  • Content: 100% Cotton
  • Care: Machine wash gentle cold, tumble dry low, cool iron. Do not use chlorine bleach or fabric softener.
  • Best used for: Blankets, Loungewear, Bibs, Burp Cloths, Tote Bags

data.name: Repeating Leaves Super Snuggle Flannel Fabric
data.description:
Get with Repeating Leaves Super Snuggle Flannel Fabric

Wrap yourself in warmth and comfort with our Repeating Leaves Super Snuggle Flannel Fabric. Made from 100% cotton, this fabric is perfect for creating blankets and more. The repeating leaf pattern adds a touch of nature to your projects, making them perfect for fall and winter.

Our flannel fabric is easy to care for, simply machine wash in cold water with non-chlorine bleach, tumble dry on low, and cool iron as needed. Imported for your convenience, this fabric is sure to become a staple in your crafting collection.
